title: Can't find out what my mystery skin gift is
body:
I was gifted with a mystery skin gift from Riot but I closed the box too fast. I thought another box / window was going to open to show the gift. I looked through all of my champions and didn't see anything new and went to the Gift History and it didn't show anything either. 
Is there a way I can find out? I also already tried to contact Riot but they haven't responded.

replies.body:
Hey String of Fate,


It looks like the mystery gift you received was Galactic Nasus! Congrats!
I did the exact same thing could you help me out pls
It was Captain Gangplank from the Bilgewater: Burning Tides event!
Any way you could check mine plz?

Hey Sej,

You can check your Mystery Gift history via the PVP.net store > Purchases > Mystery Gifting History page!
Just logged in for the first time in a long while. Got the mystery box message, but don't see anything in my Purchase History, or a Mystery Gifting page.

If it's not showing up on the Mystery Gifting page, it might have been the Championship Ward from Riot. If that's not the case, you can contact Riot Games Player Support by submitting a ticket asking what that gift was!
The first said it was for good behavior. Then a ton of other things flashed in succession, boxes and text I couldn't read in time. And then nothing.

For a fast and easy way of finding out which skin you got (if you have a small amount of skins), use the Elophant client's "Save owned skins" feature. 
> http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/champion-select 

You'll be able to see a list of all of the skins you have. For instance, here are my skins: 
>http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/summoner/na/45372498/skins

Otherwise, you can always ask Riot Games Player Support about what you received in your mystery box: 
>https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new
i did not get any mysery gift i am lvl 5 i bought 2 boxs before i went to it thinking i would have 4 and all i saw was the 2 i bought can someone help me plz

Hey Digital Ram, I recently did the connect to facebook thing and got myself a mystery champ but i closed the window too fast so I did not really read who I got or what skin I got.  Could you help me?

Hey Spam,

It looks like you received the Champion Gnar, the Missing Link!
Hey i received a mystery skin can you tell me what it was
I was in champion select when i received a mastery skin box from Rito but I wasn't able to see what it was. Can you help me with that?
Could someone let me know what my mystery gift was?

I have a similar issues could you please help?
Can you check mine please?
cant open my mytery skin chest
Hey, I received a mistery gift and I can`t find what, can you please help me too? Thank you! ^^

Helo, I too cannot find out what I received! HELP:(

Can I have some help? 
I just get Mystery chest, and didn't get anything... 
How is that possible ? 
Thx in advance :D
I've got mistery skin box 3 days ago and yet did not get any skin. I already owned Riot Kayle and now got no skin can you please help me?
I got the mystery skin box about 2 days ago but i still didn't find out what skin i won!

Hey Digital Ram, I just logged on and received a mystery chest from riot and i did not get to see what the gift was because the window closed to fast. Could you help me out?

Can you check what skin did I got?
{{champion:99}} star pls

Can you tell me which one I got, because I got the message and I don't see any new skins.
please find it out for me thanks a lot

Hey shikamaro,

You can check your Mystery Gift history via the PVP.net store > Purchases > Mystery Gifting History page!
and what are my latest 3 mystery gifts?

> Is there a way I can find out? I also already tried to contact Riot but they haven't responded.

This happened to me too could I have help on what I got

For a fast and easy way of finding out which skin you got (if you have a small amount of skins), use the Elophant client's "Save owned skins" feature. 
> http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/champion-select 

You'll be able to see a list of all of the skins you have. For instance, here are my skins: 
>http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/summoner/na/45372498/skins

Otherwise, you can always ask Riot Games Player Support about what you received in your mystery box:
